name: Ordinal Gorillas
description: Ordinal Gorillas are not just ordinary digital collectibles, but they are also the first utility-charged ordinal NFTs that appeals to builders and collectors. This makes them not only an attractive representation of your web3 identity, but also a valuable and functional addition to your digital wallet. In addition to their attractive art and historical significance, the Ordinal Gorillas also offer a convenient and user-friendly inscription service. With just a few clicks, you can easily inscribe your own unique NFT or story onto the blockchain, making these collectibles truly one-of-a-kind.
